extensionDescription: A simple OTP manager for generating and storing one-time passwords
optionsSubtitle: Manage your one-time password tokens securely
exportHelperText: Export your tokens as a JSON file for backup.
importHelperText: Import tokens from a JSON file to restore or transfer.
noTokensFoundMessage: Add your first token using the "Add New Token" button above
issuerHelperText: The service providing the OTP (e.g., Google, GitHub)
label: Label
secretKeyHelperText: The secret key provided by the service (Base32 format)
scanQRCodeHelper: Upload a QR code image to extract token information
dragDropText: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select
pasteInstruction: Or paste an image from clipboard (Ctrl+V)
imageParsingError: Error parsing QR code from image
imageParsingSuccess: Successfully parsed token information from QR code
